title: Hero: Card
code:
<gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
  <gds-card variant="primary" width="100px" height="80px" justify-content="flex-end" padding="s">
    Primary
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card variant="secondary" width="100px" height="80px" justify-content="flex-end" padding="s">
    Secondary
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card variant="brand-01" width="100px" height="80px" justify-content="flex-end" padding="s">
    Brand
  </gds-card>
</gds-flex>
